title: CloudSaver SaaS platform
desc: Built CloudSaver SaaS platform environment in AWS that are robust, scaleable, and performant.

title: White Labeling Network Routing
desc: Configured networking in the cloud so white labeling with subdomain will just work without application having to manage subdomain registration.

title: Idempotent MySQL Database Schema Migration
desc: Orchestrated MySQL database schema update using various cloud resources.

title: CloudSaver Site-to-Site VPN
desc: Setup site-to-site VPN between CloudSaver, Inc. and customer environment to retrieve internal data securely.

title: AWS Marketplace Notification Routing
desc: Routed notification from AWS Marketplace cross-account, cross-region with zero application code change.

title: Cost and Usage Data Obfuscation Process
desc: Obfuscated AWS Cost and Usage Data automatically to be used for Demo purposes.

title: Host WordPress in AWS
desc: Built scaleable WordPress site in AWS for marketing department.

title: Host Rise 360 Educational Content in AWS
desc: Setup hosting for education team  with requirements to authenticate against Microsoft 365.

title: OpenVPN Upgrade, Setup and Configured
desc: Enabled access to resources behind private network through VPN and automated SSL cert using cerbot.

title: Internal Ops Reporting Process
desc: Setup various resources to enable ops tools report generation.
